actions.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Sablan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-6 to clarify that veterans who receive telemental health services furnished by the Department as opposed to in-person mental health services would be eligible for child care assistance authorized under the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-6 to clarify that veterans who receive telemental health services furnished by the Department as opposed to in-person mental health services would be eligible for child care assistance authorized under the bill.
